pkgmetadata.longdescription: OMOP CDM Databases using the Tidyverse // Utility functions for querying electronic health record (EHR) data in 'OMOP' Common Data Model https://www.ohdsi.org/data-standardization/the- common-data-model/ databases using a 'tidyverse' approach based on 'dbplyr' lazy queries. This allows efficient in-database querying and data wrangling without explicit writing of 'SQL' queries.
